Keys.Name: MaximumSpawnGroups
Keys.Description: Maximum number of groups to spawn per interval.

Keys.Name: MinimumSpawnDistance
Keys.Description: Minimum distance that groups can spawn from the player.

Keys.Name: MaximumSpawnDistance
Keys.Description: Maximum distance that groups can spawn from the player.

Keys.Name: SpawnCheckDistance
Keys.Description: Distance player has to be from last spawn interval position to spawn NPCs again.

Keys.Name: MinimumUpdateIntervalInSeconds
Keys.Description: Minimum duration in seconds between spawn-check intervals.

Keys.Name: MaximumUpdateIntervalInSeconds
Keys.Description: Maximum duration in seconds between spawn-check intervals.
